In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said that he had been working with Larry Page and Sergey Brin on ways to simplify Google's management structure and quicken decision making. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, he said.`` In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.''
